#include<stdio.h>
long long int rec(int,int);
static long long int a[51][51];
int main(){
	int x,y;
	scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
	printf("%lld",rec(x,y));
	return 0;
}
long long int rec(int x,int y){
	if((x == 0)||(y == 0)){
		a[x][y] = 1;
		return 1;
	}
	else if((a[x-1][y] != 0) && (a[x][y-1] != 0)){
		a[x][y] = a[x-1][y] + a[x][y-1];
		return(a[x][y]);
	}	
	else if((a[x-1][y] != 0) && (a[x][y-1] == 0)){
		a[x][y] = a[x-1][y] + rec(x,y-1);
		return(a[x][y]);
	}
	else if((a[x-1][y] == 0) && (a[x][y-1] != 0)){
		a[x][y] = rec(x-1,y) + a[x][y-1];
		return(a[x][y]);
	}
	else if((a[x-1][y] == 0) && (a[x][y-1] == 0)){
		a[x][y] = rec(x-1,y) + rec(x,y-1);
		return(a[x][y]);
	}


}
